import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' const Layout = ({ children }) => { const { user, signOut } = useAuth() const handleSignOut = async () => { await signOut() } return (
Pokemon Database
{user ? ( <> Pokedex Welcome, {user.email} ) : ( <> Login Register )}
{children}
) } export default Layout
